values:
I feel like right now I am at a place that is all to familiar,, it's scary, and hopeless... I just sometimes wonder if it will ever get better. But I suppose no ones lives are perfect, even if they seem that way. 
  Lately I feel like I have lost some of the closest people to me, and i wonder if that is good or bad? Right now I am really upset about it, and yes i miss them so much, but I seem to always depend on them for my happiness, and i know that's not right. I am just afraid of anything changing, because in my mind everything is "perfect". But i suppose friends come and go , but the real ones stick around... so i guess for once, I am going to depend on God to help me through this time. As strange as that may sound, and as hard as it is for me to do, Its something that i HAVE to do... because there is no one here who seems to understand.I guess my thought for the day is.. Have you ever felt like everything was irrelevant,because when real life happens all the little things  just seem to go away and become unimportant?

I have been thinking a lot lately about what i want to do with my life. Like i look at all of our parents and only half of them seem happy. I just don't get why you would choose to do something with your life, that you know wont make you happy... I sure as heck am not going to sit around and get a job that sucks and be miserable forever. It's just stupid, like i realize some people don't have a choice but the majority of people do. Right now we can do whatever we want with our lives, so why waste it? I jsut want to be able to get on with life, and not look back and have to say " Why didn't i do more with my life when i had the chance?" I am not sure personally what i want to be or who i want to be, but i am not going to let myself get to a place where i will be cornered and not able to turn around. It just scares the crap out of me to think that i will be nothing.


Well tomorrow is homecoming.. I'm not going lol But i think me and Adam are hanging out so that should be fun :) 

I have to work on saturday at fricken 7 in the morning... ugh!! So i can't stay out really late.. 

What i don't get is why people walk around being mean and ignoring someone for no reason? I figure even if you don't want to be friends you can at least be nice enough to say hi... but i suppose you won't realize that because you only think about yourself, but i am just saying that i will never not be your friend.

Nae.. I sorry things aren't going so great... Let's make some money and leave!!!

I would just like to say that I AM HAPPY NOW!!! yay!

 

mmm....

 

These past few weeks have been really stressful and crappy but, i think now things are starting to stighten out as much as they possibly can be....


so....

umm im really sorry to everyone for being a "cranky bitch" all this week and last week...


DONE!


*(btw) I love Adam Mathew Hurst :)

I have come to the realization that I am a horrible friend, but in all honesty I just feel to tired to care. I have this way that I can just push all of my "problems" to the back of my mind, and not have to deal with them, and yes... pretend everything is okay and that my world is perfect. I miss danae.. I miss seeing her everyday, hanging out with her everyday, and jsut .. i dont know.. not caring about anything. We could just lay around and do nothing and just be content. But it doesnt seem to be that way anymore, and most of it is my fault.  I know she will alwyas be there for me, which she has proved over and over again, but I can never seem to make anyone happy. So i ahve decided to float along and whatever happens, is uppose happens. That is not a good thing to say, but i figure whats the point in even trying, when no one will be happy in the end. I just wnat things to be how they used to, but i am sick of saying that. 



                               The End
DANAE EILEEN MORGAN... THANK YOU:) I love you SOOO SOOO SOOO much...

Young girl, don't hide

You'll never change if you just run away

Young girl, just hold tight

Soon you're gonna see your brighter day

Now in a world where innocence is quickly claimed

It's so hard to stand your ground when you're so afraid

No one reaches out a hand for you to hold

When your lost outside look inside to your soul

Hmm.. well as we all know school is now in session :) I am actually liking it this year it feels more normal, and more routine. It just sucks  having to do hw and stuff but i dont really care that much.

Right about now, i am confused (suprise huh?). I don't know what i want out of anything, I really am trying to figure things out, i just honestly am at a point where i just don't know how much more i can take....But i am always changing my mind, so i don't want to make a stupid decision that i will regret, which usually is the case. So I AM LOST! i want someone to choose for me, and brent no not you lol F-U-C-K fuck fuck fuck! I just think maybe my priorities are off a little....


  
 

Take what you need
'Cause I can't hold my breath
Say what you feel
'Cause I got nothing left 

I made a promise to myself last night
I'm gonna keep it if it's wrong or right 

And if I lose it all
There'll be nothing left to lose
And I would take the fall
'Cause knowing you are out there breathing
It's so wonderful
It's a chance I'll take even if I break
And I lose it all, if I lose it all
It wouldn't matter anyway

Don't change a thing
You're perfect as you are
Time has a way 
Time is all I've got

There are a lot of things that I am not understanding right now.. I just don't know what to do anymore.I just don't even know what to say, it's like whatever i do can never be good enough... so what's the point in even trying? I just feel like this whole summer i have done everything that i thought i never would do, or even ever wanted to do. I've just become the oppostite of what i always thought i would be... what am i supposed to do now???? Start over, or just keep turning into someone i have always dreaded becoming?? Sometimes I just wonder, what's the fricken point? It is way to hard to please everyone and i obviously suck at doing that...so here i am, again, confused and alone. I suppose that i am essentialy not alone, but i just feel like no one understands me right now. I just can't be the person that i am expected to be. I GIVE UP! Can't you understand that maybe i can't be everything you thought i would be? Sorry to disappoint you, once again, maybe you will realize that i'm not what you want.

 

*I don't believe
In the smile that you leave
When you walk away
And say goodbye
Well I don't expect
The world to move underneath me
But for god sake could you try

I know that you're true to me
You're always there
You say you care
I know that you wanna be mine

Where is your heart
Cause I don't really feel you
Where is your heart
What I really want is to believe you
Is it so hard to give me what I need
I Want your heart to bleed
Thats all I'm asking for *

hi... i am here with adam.. and hes a green skittle : )

I like him alot    BYE

I am working at Mcdonalds for the first time tomorrow.. Wish me luck!

Hmm... i obviously can never make you happy .. so i guess you win, i give up. But don't expect me to always be perfect because no one is... maybe you are but im not.. So i am sorry that i cant meet your standards, but i will not be treated like crap, just so you can get a kick out of it. I will always love you as a friend, but obviously you can't deal with me having a boyfriend and other friends, so im sorry i am not ditching them for you. I am also sorry that i like to hang out with adam, and that maybe he actually treats me better than you will ever know. Inconclusion, i hope you eventually learn what friendship means. Its not somethign you earn or have to work for, friendship is when two people trust eachother enough to tell them things that are going on, and always be there for eachother NO MATTER WHAT.And i am sorry i do not fit yours.

Me and nae went and decorated our lockers today.. YIPEE!! I am so excited for school... hehehe

I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU I LOVE YOU

Today i went shopping in Lansing with my mom and Adam.. i was very mmm uncooperative i guess you could say lol, but i had fun, and got some cute stuff.... But adad has a fricken job interview at Buckle and if he gets that i am going to feel retarted because i work at Mcdoanlds lol

I honestly can't wait for school to start. I just feel so out of control and unorganized, and i dunno just like i'm floating by.... I can't wait to get back into a a schedule. I hate feeling like this....its the worst ever, but hey it always gets better.. right?

I wish that people could understand... i really am trying, but i just feel like i can never be good enough or do anything right. Honestly, i don't know what you want from me? I WANT TO BE FRIENDS because we have so much fun together and you mean a lot to me.. but i just can't keep up. I jsut feel overwhelmed with everything that is going on... I just don't like to feel that i am letting people down.

I have orientation tomorrow for Mcdonalds...:) Thank you brent!

I just wnat you to know i still love you and that i hope things will eventually be okay...

rach.. sorry i haven't called you in a while.. i miss you!

GUYS.... the worst thing happened...I got in a car accident!!! But i am really not a bad driver i swear... oh yes so me and adam are A-ok though.. but it was loose gravel, and i hit this rock and smushed the radiator and some other stuff.. oops.. so my dad called a tow truck and picked us up. Its gonna end up costing $1, 100! OOPS! But then we dropped Adam off, but he ended up coming back over at like 2:00.So we hung out until like 8:00...:)

 

 

I am just SO utterly confused by this whole situation.... * CROSS YOUR FINGERS*

Well... i am not going to New York anymore because my mom is still in the hospital, but i think she is coming home tonight, so she's fine.. but this kinda sucks lol But instead i think I am going to go to Muskegon with some of the girls in my cell group until Tuesday.. Im not sure yet.. I think it would be fun though.

I hung out with danae all yesterday and today.. we didn't do much.. just sat around and did randome things but it was still good to FINALLY see her.. hey nae.. whats your favorite noise?? And why are you so horny all the time?!! HEHEHE

Tonight i think I am going to hang out with Rach cuz i havent seen her in a while... Right now i just feel EXHAUSTED and I am not sure what else.... like i feel upset but i dont know why?? UGH! I hate this!!!! I went to the tanner today because i havent layed out int he sun for like 3 weeks, so i am practically a ghost.... but hey who cares anyways?

 


*'Cuz when you cry, all your tears I will wipe away
and when you laugh, who you think got you that way?
And when you dream, when you wake up, is it me you want to see?

Let's see... these past few days have been rea;;y busy for some reason... I got my license:) YAY!! I missed like 16 points though oopsy! But i passed so that's all that matters right? 
   Umm yesterday Adam left to go to Manistee with Alex, so he's going to be gone until Sunday, which sucks because then I am leaving on Sunday for New York until thursday! AHH! So hopefully time will go by fast...

  BRENT BRENT BRENT...

Danae and Ross just called me and they are going to be home in a few hours!! I AM SO HAPPY!!

 Okay so last night me, beth, and emily all went to Meijers to get some stuff for my mom. SO we went in got the stuff and paid for it and it was all fine and dandy. Then when i got out to the car i realized that i couldnt find my keys!!! I FREAKED OUT!! so we went back in the store and searched for them and had tem make an announcement and everything. But we still couldnt find them, so we went back out to the car and while i was inside beth had gotten this guy that worked there to get a flashlight, and i guess the keys were still in the ignition! I FELT SO DUMB! So then he got a hanger and stuck it through a crack in the window, and finally got it open... thank god for that kid!!

HI!!

I miss Lisa, Ross, and Danae =(

Well well, tomorrow is Mr. Brent's birthday YIPPE!!! happy birthday!

I finally got to hang out with Adam today! He only got tostay for a couple hours, but i was still very happy =) Hopefully when i get my license on Tuesday, it will be easier for us to see eachother... EEE!!! Thank you..

By the way, thanks brent and brandan for everything!

LETS SEE HERE...

Last night was super fun!! ahah but this morning was also an experience.. Me, Lisa, and Kyle got up at 7 and went to Hutchs to get cake mix, frosting, and skittles for Adadm because i amd "making an effort" =).. then we got home and made it blah blah then at like 9:30 we took it over but he wasnt there so left it in the kitchen (EEE! breaking and entering!) So then we went to and "undisclosed location" to get some.. stuff.. for an oopsy! haha it was definatly funny... but yeah so then I called Adams hosue and i talked to his mom and i guess Alex f. was with them and he had gotten into a car accident(she said he was okay though) so she wnated me to call my mom because she works in the emergency room.. so i called her  and asked her to meet them at the hospital when they got there... so i hope hes fine and its noting serious! BUT IT FREAKED ME OUT!! ahh!
 

So tonight some of us are going out to eat or something so that should be fun =)

WELL WELL WELL....

This was a very disasterous... sad.. frusterating ... worrying... exhausting week, but in the end it turned out a-ok =)

Danae and Ross are gone at IYC.. i miss them tons and tons!!! danae called me and she was having a freaking panic attack and i feel so bad because i can't be there to help her...

Me, Lisa, and Kyle are all hanging out haveing the BEST time EVER!! I MISSED THEM! Bethy was here but she got sick or soemthing and missed out on all the fun =( But THANK GOD that they were here, you know! We had some very interesting talks so far and its only 1:32... eeek banana head!!

Well Today danae and Ross left for IYC.. i am going to miss them immensly, especially my baby nae nae....she was really depressed before she left so i hope that she will be okay for a while by herself! But they will be back i think August 5th, so i might get to see her then, but i am leaving with amanda on the 7 for new york so who knows!!
 

 Today i got my hair done, i promise i am not going to dye it again for a LONG time!!                    

I hope that this will work out, because honestly i never wanted to hurt you and i want you to believe me ...

I'm at danaes right now and we just finished packing for IYC...she is leaving tomorrow for 10 days! Ross is also leaving so i will have pracically no one to hang out with.. i mean rachel will be here but shes always busy so that doesnt work out... but i can hang out with beth or brent or maybe meghan! I just can't deal with my family right now, my mother is being a lunatic and obsessing over where i am 24/7! i CAN'T HANDLE IT!!

I just want to get away.. from them and from everything....

 

I just wish everything was different... i can't do this anymore.

From Here to There ...

Across the land and passed the beached whales

Lies two girls and two boys

One is near and one is far

It left a wound that made a scar

All alone without someone to hold

They turn bitter and cold

Drinks of all sizes, colors, and flavors fill the night

The mornings consumed with regret because something just wasn't right

To hide would be to lie

But to lie would make it seem okay

Not wanting to risk the only thing they love

Not wanting to lose the trust that was built

Not wanting to be alone

Not wanting to live in a world filled with guilt

But they told...

Shot down and all alone

Realizing now what they really are

Realizing now who they have become

Realizing now that you are so far

They are not perfect, they make mistakes

Forgiveness is not living in sorrow

Learn from Yesterday, Live for today, and HOPE for tomorrow

 

By: A Reliable Source

I'm not a perfect person
There's many things I wish I didn't do
But I continue learning
I never meant to do those things to you
And so I have to say before I go
That I just want you to know

I've found a reason for me
To change who I used to be
A reason to start over new
and the reason is you

I'm sorry that I hurt you
It's something I must live with everyday
And all the pain I put you through
I wish that I could take it all away
And be the one who catches all your tears

*I hope you will understand and forgive me... i will always love you.. so i'll be waiting.. as long as it takes*

  

   Last night i had a very good converstaion with danae and i think now more than ever we are going to get better.. together and on our own.. this whole summer has just been so fucked up and i am just now realizing how i am so confused and that this is not who i am! I just regret not figuring this out sooner.. because now its all over.. AND I CAN NEVER TAKE IT BACK!!!! I suppose everyone makes mistakes but mine just always seem to hurt more people than i initially think they will.. so now i am trying to change, because i realize now that none of that stuff even matters.. and i need to find out who I am , and stop trying to be perfect and stop trying to please everyone. And maybe then everything will be okay and you will love me.. i am so sorry for ruining us.

 

Danae is leaving for 10 days :( then i am leaving to new york with amanda : )

Well here i am at miss bethany kay's house...she came over today and we layed out in the sun and attempted to get tan.. then i came over here!!! PARTY!
 Danae left for ohio yesterday and shes coming back tomorrow, but i still miss her!!! Then rachel is leaving tomorrow.. and adams gone until saturday! AHH I FEEL SO ALONE!! haha but i still have beth so its A-ok!
  I am painting my room on tueday.. purple with green stripes.. so hopefully it turns out cute :)
  Our cell group party was really fun!! haha... except the question game (STEPHANIE) but being the good citizen that i am, i didnt get back at her...:)But i talked with amanda for the first time this summer, and shes going to New York with me Aug. 7-11! im SUPER EXCITED!!! 
I think i am hanging out with Kyle tomorrow.. we are going to bake a cake EEE!!

Well today i sucessfully spent $100 on clothes and purses... eeek!! Oh yes i got my pictures developed from mine and brandans party! They are so cute.. so me and my mom started this photo album.. but there wasnt enough pictures to fill it up so tonight at our cell group party (yay!) i am taking more pictures.. so hopefully a lot of girls show up :)
  *My Adam has left me for a week on his mission trip to Tennessee.. i am quite sad and upset about this and i will miss him intensly... but at least it is for a good cause lol.. but he's coming back on saturday or sunday so i am excited for that!*
    I am getting my hair cut next tuesday on the 26th and im getting it dyed like and Auburn color with blonde highlights!! Im super eee excited!!! HOORAY! I hung out with rachel today for the first time in forever!! She helped me scrapbook and then we went to Target and bought a whole bunch of purses and junk! It was super dee duper fun!

  In conclusion i would like to say "WHAT UP" to brent and i am excited to hang out tomorrow! YAY FOR SHOPPING... and rice cakes lol

Oh yes and danae you are my foundation and without you i would crumble! Thanks for being the best ever! And i am so sorry for not understanding until now.. and I am happy that you can understand me too :) These words are my own From my heart flow I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you There's no other way To better say I love you, I love you...

EEE!

feel like I've been blown apart
There are pieces here
I don't know where they go
I don't know where they go

Kiss me on my salty lips
I bet you feel a little crazy
But for me
We'll be famous on TV

Would it be my fault if I could turn you on?
Would I be so bad if I could turn you on?
When I kiss your mouth, I wanna taste it
Turn you upside down, don't wanna waste it

I jump on you, you jump on me
You push me out and
Even though you know I love you
I'd be inclined to slap you in the mouth

When I kiss your salty lips
You will feel a little crazy
But for me
I'll be famous on TV

Today i got up and cleaned... ahha yes because i am grounded until thursday but its not really a big deal...

It is official.. i miss my adam! GOOD LORD! haha but i really want to see him but obviously i can't :( 

WELL... mine and brandans party was super fun! thanks for everyone that came!!!! Oh yes and meghan i am really glad that we met you seem really awesome! It kinda sucked that we got thrown in a bazillion times though lol
 
 I ate half of a cake and gained about 12lbs so i think i need to work out tomorrow.. yes that is what i shall do :)

Today... hmm it was interesting... i just want to say that danae i love you and i hope we can get through all this crap together... we just need to do this, for ourselves and eachother

Well on a lighter note my party is tomorrow.. and everyone better bring their bathing suits! I ordered a barbie cake.. eee!!!! RACHEL WHY DO U AHVE TO LEAVE ME?!!?!!?

Yesterday i went over to Adams for the first time in a long time.. we had fun:)I never thought we would be together, but now that we are I am SOOO happy!

I never realized how insane people are, good heavens!!

Beth, lisa and rach came over on wednesday.. it was super fun!! We dyed hair and went skinny dipping! You know typical night... lol

Danae got me the best birthday present... Breast enhancement pills!!! I ABOUT PEED EVERYWHERE!! watch out guys.. BIG BOOBED BECCA!

  Beth came over last night.. it was really cool to talk to her! We hadn't talked in forever and im happy that we are friends again! It's weird how fast that you can grow apart from people without realizing it... but i think sometime this week me, beth, rach and lisa are going to hang out just like old times:)

  Tomorrow is my birthday...i suppose it doesnt really matter though because i can't get my license until august anyways... GRR!

 

I wake up in the morning
Put on my face
The one that's gonna get me
Through another day
Doesn't really matter
How I feel inside
'Cause life is like a game sometimes

But then you came around me
The walls just disappeared
Nothing to surround me
And keep me from my fears
I'm unprotected
See how I've opened up
Oh, you've made me trust

Because I've nver felt like this before
I'm naked
Around you
Does it show?
You see right through me
And I can't hide
I'm naked
Around you
And it feels so right

My birthday is on tuesday... yay :)Don't forget, my party is on saturday! EVERYONE BETTER COME BECAUSE I DO NOT WANT IT TO BE STUPID! So whoever wants to come can come... and call me if you have questions!  
 

  I was thinking that maybe their really is no point... its all just an endless cycle that can never reach perfection... so why even try? The realitity of accepting it for what it is i guess just hasn't sunk in...I am always trying and obviously you can't handle the fact that one day none of this stuff will even matter.. and thats all you care about? Why care about people that you will never talk to after highschool and who only want you for one reason? I have tried to help you but it is NEVER enough.. no matter what i do, i guess you will never be satisfied with who you are...i understand to an extent, but why torture yourself over people who don't care?? I WANT YOU TO UNDERSTAND! Why won't you listen?

 

it doesn't mean much
it doesn't mean anything at all
the life i've left behind me
is a cold room
i've crossed the last line
from where i can't return
where every step i took in faith
betrayed me
and led me from my home

and sweet
sweet surrender
is all that i have to give

you take me in
no questions asked
you strip away the ugliness
that surrounds me
are you an angel
am i already that gone
i only hope
that i won't disappoint you
when i'm down here
on my knees

and sweet
sweet
sweet surrender
is all that i have to give

sweet
sweet
sweet surrender
is all that i have to give

and i don't understand
by the touch of your hand
i would be the one to fall

i miss the little things
oh i miss everything

it doesn't mean much
it doesn't mean anything at all
the life i left behind me
is a cold room
